body:
I am testing test/functional/rpc_signmessage.py.
test code:
>         
        self.log.info('test signing with an address with wallet')
        address = self.nodes[0].getnewaddress("", "bech32")
        signature = self.nodes[0].signmessage(address, message)

report error: Address does not refer to key (-3)

> stdout:
2019-05-24T11:48:36.964000Z TestFramework (INFO): Initializing test directory /var/folders/jd/c9npkg1x7t75h7v3ctbgnpbh0000gn/T/test_runner_â¿_ð_20190524_194836/rpc_signmessage_0

test_framework.authproxy.JSONRPCException: Address does not refer to key (-3)

title: BECH32 address signmessage failed
